block.p: LEAGUE--Suspended Chicago White Sox C A.J. Pierzynski one game and fined him an undisclosed amount for inappropriate actions during a June 7 game against the Yankees.

American League BOSTON RED SOX--Activated RHP Mike Timlin from the 15-day DL. Designated LHP J.C. Romero for assignment. YANKEES--Optioned RHP Chris Britton to Scranton/Wilkes-Barre (IL). Purchased the contract of RHP Roger Clemens from Scranton. Transferred RHP Phil Hughes from the 15- to the 60-day DL. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Traded C Adam Melhuse to Texas for cash. TEXAS RANGERS--Placed 1B Mark Teixeira on the 15-day DL. Recalled INF Travis Metcalf from Frisco (Texas). Activated OF Brad Wilkerson from the 15-day DL. Optioned RHP Kameron Loe to Oklahoma (PCL).

National League ATLANTA BRAVES--Placed RHP Lance Cormier on the 15-day DL. Recalled RHP Buddy Carlyle from Richmond (IL). CHICAGO CUBS--Placed OF Cliff Floyd on the bereavement list. Purchased the contract of RHP Mike Fontenot from Iowa (PCL). PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Placed RHP Freddy Garcia on the 15-day DL. Signed RHP Jose Mesa. PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Placed RHP Salomon Torres on the 15-day DL. Purchased the contract of RHP Masumi Kuwata from Indianapolis (IL).
